message.raw:
Now handles either a file or folder as a command line argument. Opens the first file in the folder, or opens the specified file. Uses the cwd if neither file nor folder are supplied. Populates the file list on the left with the h5 files in the given folder, or in the same folder as the file specified.

Also sorts the tabs alphabetically.

Also sorts the tabs alphabetically.
